output_text_list: The video shows a cartoon scene with a lion sitting in a caravan. The lion is wearing a hat, sunglasses, and a yellow shirt. He is talking to a cat sitting next to him. The cat has an angry expression on its face. There is a yellow bus next to the caravan. A man with a tan hat and sunglasses is standing in front of the bus. The bus is covered in graffiti and has a red hood. There are trees and hills in the background. The text on the screen is in Chinese. The camera focuses on the lion, the cat, and the man. The sound of the wind is heard in the background. There are no other characters or objects in the scene. The camera angle is a low angle, looking up at the lion and the bus. The lighting is dim, with shadows cast on the ground. The scene is static, with no movement or action. The video ends after 118 seconds.
